main.name: Hari Setiawan
main.description: I am a freelance developer currently residing in South Korea
main.bio: I am a quick to learn person and willing to discover and accept new ideas. I got my CS degree in Indonesia, then I got my Master degree in Pusan National University recently. I have worked as software engineer in different places for six years. Mostly I used PHP framework such as Laravel and Codeigniter. I also work with C++ to develop a desktop apps. In spare time, I like to create some utility tools for my own daily purposes using Python or Javascript. Currently, I am focused on learning React Native to develop a cross platform apps. Additionally, I'm also interested to work with Web 3.0 technology especially Blockchain (e.g: Smart contract, Bitcoin)
main.contactmessage: If you have any inquiry you can contact me by email

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: While here, I spent most of my time learning database system and blockchain (Solidity and Hyperledger fabric). Since then, I am looking forward to utilize the blockchain's nature which are secure and decentralized. Under the supervision and guidance of my Professor, I was working to develop several project in C++. These projects are including but not limited to vessel simulation and rule engine visualization desktop application.

Here I found my passion to dive into the software engineering path. I studied a lot about a good database design, the importance of fault-tolerance database, etc. I finished my thesis with a topic about emotion recognition from text using ensemble method.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: I gained most of my development experience here, since I had joined Medify.id from the beginning as a startup company. I worked to develop a hospital information system from the bottom using Laravel with my team. Since Medify.id focuses on medical field system, I had to built an API system to receive the data provided by laboratorium devices. I also had the chance to developed the API using Node.js for the mobile application.

work.title: Software Engineer Internship
work.description: Working for a mature startup company gave me a big insight about being a software engineer. Here, I gained a chance to develop an HTML email template generator that can adapt to various marketing requirement using Codeigniter. I also learn how a continuous integration and deployment are used, so the company website can continuously serving while adding new features. Jenkins, containerization, and testing working together to make continuous integration possible.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Here, I learned for the first time how to build a real-world project. I built a startup website for online book rental using Codeigniter framework.

skills.name: Javascript (React, React Native, Node.js)
skills.content: Due to the technology these days, I have been using Javascript both in frontend and backend. In my early days, I mostly used Javascript to provide the interaction in the website. Later, I've been using Node.js with Express framework to built a reliable API accompanied with React as its frontend. Nowadays, I'm looking to improve my skill by using React Native to develop a mobile apps.
